statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Male';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY start_date DESC, campaign_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Young Adults' OR target_audience = 'Families' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.6 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND target_audience = 'Seniors' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%Women%' ORDER BY campaign_id ASC
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Table;
SELECT user_id, conversion_value FROM A/B_Testing_Table WHERE conversion_status = true;
SELECT experiment_group, COUNT(*) FROM A/B_Testing_Table GROUP BY experiment_group;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Table ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, conversion_status FROM A/B_Testing_Table WHERE experiment_group = 1;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Table WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT experiment_group, conversion_status FROM A/B_Testing_Table WHERE conversion_value > 100;
SELECT user_id, experiment_group, conversion_status, conversion_value FROM A/B_Testing_Table WHERE experiment_group = 1 ORDER BY conversion_value DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, marketing_channel FROM Marketing_Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Table JOIN Marketing_Campaigns ON A/B_Testing_Table.user_id = Marketing_Campaigns.campaign_id WHERE conversion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name FROM A/B_Testing WHERE experiment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM Marketing_Campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM Marketing_Campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000;
SELECT experiment_id, group_id, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing JOIN Campaign_Results ON A/B_Testing.experiment_id = Campaign_Results.experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM A/B_Testing WHERE group_id = 1
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, group_id, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date, group_id FROM A/B_Testing WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT cr.campaign_id, cr.campaign_name, cr.campaign_start_date, cr.campaign_end_date, cr.campaign_budget, cc.experiment_id, cc.conversion_status, cc.conversion_amount FROM Marketing_Campaigns AS cr INNER JOIN Campaign_Results AS cc ON cr.campaign_id = cc.campaign_id ORDER BY cr.campaign_budget DESC
SELECT * FROM A/B_testing_campaigns;
SELECT experiment_id, campaign_name FROM A/B_testing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, clicks, conversions FROM Campaign_results WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT experiment_id, user_name, email FROM Campaign_participants WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM Campaign_segments WHERE segment_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM A/B_testing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM A/B_testing_campaigns WHERE experiment_id = 5;

SELECT campaign_name, clicks, revenue FROM A/B_testing_campaigns JOIN Campaign_results ON A/B_testing_campaigns.experiment_id = Campaign_results.experiment_id WHERE clicks > 100 AND revenue > 500 ORDER BY clicks DESC, revenue DESC;
SELECT participant_id, user_name, email FROM Campaign_participants WHERE experiment_id = 3 AND user_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY participant_id ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, segment_name FROM A/B_testing_campaigns JOIN Campaign_segments ON A/B_testing_campaigns.experiment_id = Campaign_segments.experiment_id WHERE segment_name IN ('Segment A', 'Segment B') ORDER BY campaign_name ASC, segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_results;
SELECT user_id, variation, conversion_event FROM experiment_results;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, marketing_channel FROM campaign_data;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM user_segments;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate, revenue_generated, clicks FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, conversion_event FROM experiment_results WHERE variation = 'A/B Test';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT user_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM user_segments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM experiment_groups WHERE users_in_group > 100 ORDER BY group_id DESC;
